title.rendered: GME TX3350 UHF CB RADIO 5 WATT SUPER COMPACT – LCD SPEAKER MICROPHONE

content.rendered:
GME TX3350 UHF CB RADIO 5 WATT SUPER COMPACT – LCD SPEAKER MICROPHONE

GME TX3350 UHF CB Radio 5 Watt Super Compact with LCD Speaker Microphone available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The TX3350 is a feature-packed Super Compact UHF CB radio including a SoundPath™ LCD speaker microphone.

SoundPath™ is a unique solution that allows the full-function LCD microphone to house a built-in speaker, offering clear audio all within a compact and ergonomic design. SoundPath™ diverts the audio through a convex path around the microphone bollard, whilst maintaining the compact size of the unit.

The TX3350 offers a unique combination of the space-saving benefits of a Super Compact sized radio and full-function LCD speaker microphone, all in the palm of your hand.

This means that the radio can be discretely installed in almost any location within a vehicle without the need for an extension speaker – perfect for modern vehicles where space is at a premium.

Features;

  • Powered by Pure Sound DSP engine
  • Full spectrum backlit LCD microphone with Soundpath speaker
  • User selectable open and group scan
  • User adjustable squelch
  • User selectable duplex channels
  • User selectable priority channel
  • 104 in-built DCS codes
  • 50 in-built CTCSS codes
  • 5 digit selcall with quiet mode
  • Five year warranty
  • Australian design and manufacture

CLICK HERE to view the full range of products available for your 4×4!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
